name: Duoc Nguyen
tagline: Pi-shaped engineer: Go/TS backend × AI agents/MCP × Product iteration
bio: Engineering Manager at FireGroup, building e-commerce systems at scale.

I've spent over a decade building products across the stack. Started as a frontend developer in 2013, co-founded Vue.js Vietnam in 2016 when the framework was just taking off. These days I work mostly with Go and TypeScript, focusing on backend systems and AI tooling.

Side projects at aiocean.io explore AI agents and MCP integration. I write about engineering and product thinking at 12bit.vn and onepercent.plus - mostly technical deep dives and lessons from building products.

Key projects include vue-loading-spinner (688 stars), jira-mcp (80 stars) for AI-Jira integration, and telegram-mcp for connecting AI assistants to Telegram via MTProto. Recent work focuses on MCP servers and developer tooling that makes AI more useful for real work.
I care about building tools that solve actual problems, not just interesting technical challenges. The best code is the code that ships and helps users get things done.
now: Building invest: investment portfolio tracker with dashboard
Maintaining telegram-mcp: AI-to-Telegram MCP server via MTProto
Contributing to CodeWiki multilingual codebase documentation
